<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE sqlMap PUBLIC "-//ibatis.apache.org//DTD SQL Map 2.0//EN" "http://ibatis.apache.org/dtd/sql-map-2.dtd"> <sqlMap namespace="#ENTITY_NAME#"> <resultMap id="ResultMap.#ENTITY_NAME#" class="#pakage#.bean.#Service#Bean"> #begin# <result property="#field_name#" column="#field_name#"></result>#end# </resultMap>
<select id="SELECT.#ENTITY_NAME#" parameterClass="kr.co.dreamlabs.#namespace#.common.database.bean.#ENTITY_NAME#Bean" resultMap="ResultMap.#ENTITY_NAME#"> SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ROWID DESC) RNUM #begin# ,#field_name##end# FROM #entity_name# WHERE 1=1 <dynamic> <!-- <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="fromDate"> <isNotNull property="toDate">sys_cr_dt between TO_DATE(#fromDate#,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') and TO_DATE(#toDate#,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') </isNotNull> </isNotNull> --> #begin# <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="#field_name#" >#field_name#=##field_name##</isNotNull>#end# #begin# <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="$_#field_name#" >#field_name# like '%'||#$_#field_name##||'%' </isNotNull>#end# </dynamic> </select>
<select id="SELECT.#ENTITY_NAME#_PAGE" resultMap="ResultMap.#ENTITY_NAME#" parameterClass="#pakage#.bean.#Service#ParmBean">
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT <isNotNull property="ORDERBY"> ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $ORDERBY$) RNUM </isNotNull> <isNull property="ORDERBY"> ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ROWID DESC) RNUM </isNull> #begin# ,#field_name##end# FROM #entity_name# WHERE 1=1 <dynamic prepend=""> <!-- <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="fromDate"> <isNotNull property="toDate">sys_cr_dt between TO_DATE(#fromDate#,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') and TO_DATE(#toDate#,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') </isNotNull> </isNotNull> --> #begin# <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="#field_name#" >#field_name#=##field_name##</isNotNull>#end# #begin# <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="$_#field_name#" >#field_name# like '%'||#$_#field_name##||'%' </isNotNull>#end# </dynamic> ) LIST <isNotNull property="CURPAGE"> WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ((#CURPAGE#-1) * #RCOUNT#)+1 AND (#CURPAGE# * #RCOUNT#) </isNotNull>
</select>
<select id="SELECT.#ENTITY_NAME#_COUNT" resultClass="int" parameterClass="#pakage#.bean.#Service#ParmBean"> SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #entity_name# WHERE 1=1 <dynamic prepend=""> <!-- <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="fromDate"> <isNotNull property="toDate">sys_cr_dt between TO_DATE(#fromDate#,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') and TO_DATE(#toDate#,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') </isNotNull> </isNotNull> --> #begin# <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="#field_name#" >#field_name#=##field_name##</isNotNull>#end# #begin# <isNotNull prepend=" AND " property="$_#field_name#" >#field_name# like '%'||#$_#field_name##||'%' </isNotNull>#end# </dynamic> </select>
<insert id="INSERT.#ENTITY_NAME#"> INSERT INTO #ENTITY_NAME#( <dynamic>#begin# <isNotNull prepend=" #conjunction# " property="#field_name#">#field_name#</isNotNull>#end# </dynamic>
) VALUES( <dynamic>#begin# <isNotNull prepend=" #conjunction# " property="#field_name#">##field_name##</isNotNull>#end# </dynamic> ) </insert>
<delete id="DELETE.#ENTITY_NAME#"> DELETE FROM #ENTITY_NAME# WHERE 1=1 #begin# AND #key_fields# = ##key_fields## #end# </delete>
<update id="UPDATE.#ENTITY_NAME#"> UPDATE #ENTITY_NAME# SET <dynamic> #begin# <isNotNull prepend=" #conjunction# " property="#field_name#" >#field_name#=##field_name##</isNotNull>#end# </dynamic> WHERE 1=1 #begin# AND #key_fields# = ##key_fields## #end# </update> </sqlMap>
